name: NSUserUnixTask
desc: An object that executes unix applications.

items.name: func execute(withArguments: [String]?, completionHandler: NSUserUnixTask.CompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Execute the unix script with the specified arguments.

items.name: typealias NSUserUnixTask.CompletionHandler
items.desc: Implement this block to retrieve an error from the Unix scripted executed by execute(withArguments:completionHandler:).
